scripts.git:bundle: npm run git:add && npm run git:commit && npm run git:push
scripts.git:bundle:origin: npm run git:add:origin && npm run git:commit:origin && npm run git:push:origin
scripts.git:commit: git commit -m "ðŸ¤–ðŸ§¶ | Automatic deploy by yarn"
scripts.git:commit:origin: git commit -m "ðŸ¤–ðŸ§¶ | Automatic deploy by yarn"
scripts.git:all: echo git[all]: Running git:all on local machine && npm run git:bundle
scripts.vercel:dev: echo vercel[dev]: Running `deploy` script on providers: Vercel && vercel
scripts.vercel:prod: echo vercel[prod]: Running `deploy` script on providers: Vercel && vercel --prod
scripts.heroku: echo heroku[main]: Running `deploy` script on providers: Heroku && npm run git:bundle
scripts.deploy:dev: echo deploy[dev]: Running `deploy` script on providers: Vercel && npm run vercel:dev
scripts.deploy:prod: echo deploy[prod]: Running `deploy` script on providers: Vercel && npm run vercel:prod
